Docs.param: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.
Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.
Docs.remarks: Always dispose the object before you release your last reference to the . Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the finalizer.

MemberSignature.Value: public SkiaSharp.SKTypeface MatchCharacter (string familyName, string[] bcp47, char character);
.method public hidebysig instance class SkiaSharp.SKTypeface MatchCharacter(string familyName, string[] bcp47, char character) cil managed

Docs.param: The family name to use when searching.
The ISO 639, 15924, and 3166-1 code to use when searching, such as "ja" and "zh".
The character to find a typeface for.
Docs.summary: Use the system fallback to find a typeface for the given character.
Docs.returns: Returns the that contains the given character, or if none was found.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
Note that `bcp47` is a combination of ISO 639, 15924, and3166-1 codes, so it is fine to just pass a ISO 639 here. The first item is the least significant fallback, and the last is the most significant.
If no specified codes match, any font with the requested character will be matched.
This method may return `null` if no family can be found for the character in the system fallback.

Docs.returns: Returns the that contains the given character, or if none was found.

MemberSignature.Value: public SkiaSharp.SKTypeface MatchFamily (string familyName, SkiaSharp.SKFontStyle style);
.method public hidebysig instance class SkiaSharp.SKTypeface MatchFamily(string familyName, class SkiaSharp.SKFontStyle style) cil managed

Docs.param: The family name to use when searching.
The font style to use when searching.
Docs.summary: Find the closest matching typeface to the specified family name and style.
Docs.returns: Returns the that contains the given family name and style, or the default font if no matching font was found.
Docs.remarks: Will never return , as it will return the default font if no matching font is found.

Docs.param: The typeface to use when searching.
The font style to use when searching.
Docs.summary: Find the closest matching typeface to the specified typeface and style.
Docs.returns: Returns the that contains the given typeface and style, or the default font if no matching font was found.
Docs.remarks: Will never return , as it will return the default font if no matching font is found.
